item.description:
Chakras: Energy, Emotions & Body

Energy is the source of all human functions.

Energy imbalance can be the source of dis-ease.

The chakras are seven major energy centers in the body that begin at the base of the spine and finish at the top of the head, storing positive and negative thoughts, feelings and emotions associated with unresolved traumas, wounds and conflicts experienced over the course of life.  These experiences first affect the energy system then filter through the physical body impacting it in a very predictable way.  Most health concerns are caused by an imbalance within the chakra itself.  The imbalance negatively impacts physical bodily functions connected to each chakra, which, in time, can manifest into physical “dis-ease”.  By understanding how energy, emotions and bodily functions are connected, it is possible to identify how and why the chakras are out of balance.

Become aware:

  • Understand the energy system within you.
  • Identify how the strengths and fears associated with each chakra affect you.
  • Discover the connection between your organs to your energy system.
  • Learn how to regain energetic balance.
  • Know you are energy first.

Workshop details:

  • When: Friday, August 24th
  • Time: 7pm
  • Price: $15.00
  • What to bring:  You! And  all are welcome!

Great tea will be provided! 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Presenter: Susan Bradshaw.

Susan T. Bradshaw is a Reiki  Practitioner and Teacher. She started learning and practicing energy work several years ago. Susan is constantly furthering her knowledge through practicing , researching and studying various types of holistic energy healing. She offers her services in Jin Shin Jyutsu, Chakra Balancing, Numerology & Astrology, Spiritual Counseling and Tarot Reading.
item.name: Chakras: Energy, Emotions & Body
